quote: The rottweiler stood his ground and waited for me to take the next step in the dance of ritualized intimidation. Instead, I leaped at him. Screw ritual. Now was not the time to stand on ceremony.
quote_letters: THE ROTTWEILER STOOD HIS GROUND AND WAITED FOR ME TO TAKE THE NEXT STEP IN THE DANCE OF RITUALIZED INTIMIDATION INSTEAD I LEAPED AT HIM SCREW RITUAL NOW WAS NOT THE TIME TO STAND ON CEREMONY
